<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>adding tableChoicesScript=TableCleanerList attribute to the tablename field in sys_auto_flush to display only table cleaner enabled table names in Auto Flush form</description>
        <name>Add tableChoiceScript to  sys_auto_flush</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_auto_flush');
gr.addQuery('element', 'tablename');
gr.query();

var tableChoices = 'tableChoicesScript=TableCleanerList';
var showTableNames = 'show_table_names_on_label=true';
var includeNone = 'includeNone=true';
if (gr.next()) {
    var currentAttr = gr.getValue('attributes');
    if (JSUtil.nil(currentAttr)) {
		gr.setValue('attributes', tableChoices + "," + showTableNames + "," + includeNone);
    } else {
        var updatedAttr = currentAttr;
        if (!currentAttr.includes(tableChoices)) {
            updatedAttr += "," + tableChoices;
        }
        if (!currentAttr.includes(showTableNames)) {
            updatedAttr += "," + showTableNames;
        }
        if (!currentAttr.includes(includeNone)) {
            updatedAttr += "," + includeNone;
        }
	    gr.setValue('attributes', updatedAttr);
    }
	gr.update();
}]]></script>
